triplets: Kitchen appliance designed for mixing, pureeing, or emulsifying food and liquids
Blending, mixing, chopping, pureeing, and making smoothies, sauces, soups, or drinks
Jar made of glass or plastic; blades made of stainless steel; base and housing made of plastic or metal; motor components inside the base
Jar to hold ingredients for blending
Blade for cutting and blending ingredients
Lid to prevent spills during operation
Base housing the motor and control buttons
Varies depending on manufacturer and model; common colors include white, black, silver, and transparent jar
Kitchen appliances, home cooking equipment, and food preparation tools
Various manufacturers producing household and commercial blenders
Approximately 1–5 kg depending on model and material
Typically 5–10 years depending on frequency of use, motor quality, and maintenance
